course_description: This is a continuation of the required course in the Econometrics core sequence.  Topics include: bootstrapping, limited dependent variables, panel data models, non-linear and generalized least squares, quantile regression, numerical optimization, measurement error models, asymptotic tests, linear systems of equations, and nonparametric regression.
prerequisites: ECON 520 and ECON 521 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 4098, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 4-5:15p, Instructor: Z. Fang, Status: Open
